text: Mohammed Ahmed bin Sulayem or Mohammed ben Sulayem (; born 12 November 1961) is an Emirati former rally driver. He is the president of the FIA (Fédération Internationale de l'Automobile) since 2021. He was one of the most successful Arab drivers in motor sport history, earning 14 FIA Middle East Rally Championship titles. In 1991, Sulayem founded the UAE Desert Challenge. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Racecar drivers Category:Emirati sportspeople
title: Mohammed bin Sulayem
